thread.title: Little Respite in the Big City
thread.title_full: Little Respite in the Big City - Review of Hotel Claridge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ElilouNYC
title: Little Respite in the Big City
text: A lovely, cozy hotel steps from the Champs Elysees, and in the heart of fashion row. If you are wanting a big "American"-sized hotel, this is not for you. The rooms are very well appointed, but petite. Lovely breakfast buffet, and room service from a nearby restaurant. The bed was incredibly comfortable, all rooms seem to have TV, nice bathrooms, a desk, free WiFi, and more. As a single traveler, I felt very safe and "at home."
